description_carte: Capricorn, a fallen deity, guards ancient secrets and crushing despair within its crumbling form.
description_visuelle: A towering statue of a goat-headed figure, cracked and broken. Moss and fungi grow across its surface. Its eyes glow with a faint, unsettling light.

skills.name: Stone Shard
skills.description: Deals earth damage and has a chance to apply bleed.

skills.name: Crushing Despair
skills.description: Deals earth damage based on Capricorn's HP and DEF.

skills.name: Idol's Fall
skills.description: Deals earth damage to all enemies and reduces their vit.

skills.name: Unmoving Stance
skills.description: Increases Capricorn's defense and reduces vit.
